articles.title: New Zealand's Visa Curbs Likely To Hit Indian Immigrants - NDTV
articles.description: Taking a cue from Australia and Canada, New Zealand has announced tighter visa rules to check the number of immigrants, increasing the requirements to qualify for jobs in the country.
articles.content:
New Zealand government hopes to control the "unsuitable" number of migrants entering the country.
